description: At Forward, I developed and maintained a platform of components and tools to support U.S. public sector leaders, improving efficiency and compliance. I enhanced communication services for government programs through SMS, calls, video conferencing, and email, while designing API improvements that cut response times by 50%. I built a scalable service for multichannel notifications, strengthened API security, and optimized performance with caching, AWS cost reductions of 20%, and database tuning. Additionally, I delivered key features requested by Product Managers, automating processes and reducing manual work by 50%.
achievements: Enhanced communication services for government programs via SMS, calls, video conferencing, and email.
Reduced API response times by 50% through improved error handling.
Built a scalable multichannel notification service for complex workflows.
Strengthened API security and improved performance using caching.
Optimized AWS services, achieving a 20% cost reduction without impacting availability.
Boosted database performance with stored procedures and ORM tuning.
Automated internal processes, cutting manual work by 50%.

company: Everis & Banco de Credito del Peru
description: Built and maintained Java microservices for a banking platform. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality microservices.
achievements: Developed and maintained 10+ Java microservices, improving scalability and deployment speed with Atlas Framework (based on Spring Boot).
Built high-performance REST APIs with Spring WebFlux and RxJava, improving system response capacity by 35%.
Managed Azure SQL and Azure Cosmos DB, ensuring high availability and data consistency.
Worked with Scrum to deliver iterative and high-quality solutions.
Refactored and developed code following SOLID principles and design patterns, reducing coupling between critical components.
Wrote unit tests with JUnit 5 under TDD, achieving +85% code coverage.
Led a team of 3 developers, providing mentorship and promoting collaboration.
Coordinated with stakeholders to plan releases and solve cross-team blockers.

description: I was responsible for the development and maintenance of monolithic applications using technologies like ASP.NET and jQuery, while also designing and managing CI/CD pipelines.
achievements: Developed and maintained high-performance monolithic applications with Web API, ASP.NET, and jQuery.
Designed CI/CD pipelines with Bamboo, Docker, Puppet, and SonarQube, reducing deployment times.
Managed MySQL databases, optimizing queries and structures for better performance.
Refactored legacy code using SOLID and design patterns, reducing technical debt.
Wrote unit tests that increased coverage and reduced production issues.
Maintained mobile apps in Swift and Kotlin, ensuring compatibility and performance.
Developed and maintained Full Stack applications with Django and Angular.
Led a team of 3 people, managing requirements with the Product Owner.

Led a team of 3 developers, participating in requirement definition with Product Owners.
